__TOC__

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2011-05-18|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 18^th^ of May, 2011.

* Some team members met face to face and on IRC to hold a <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/989/detail/ | Ubuntu Ireland LoCo Re-approval Preparation Meeting]]</nowiki> on Saturday 21^st^ of May, 2011. One picture <nowiki>[[http://pix.ie/ubuntuie/2334504/in/album/409407 | here]]</nowiki> 

* On Thursday 26^th^ of May the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/963/detail/ | Limerick Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> took place in the Absolute Hotel at 18:00. 

* Some team members helped to organise and then participated in the inaugural <nowiki>[[http://www.sciencegallery.com/events/2011/05/code-retreat-dublin | Code Retreat Dublin]]</nowiki> which took place in the Science Gallery, Dublin on the 28^th^ of May, 2011.
